body:
Haven't done one of these things for quite a few months, so I may as well make one to blend in with the sudden fluctuation of AMAs. c:

AMA. (Please try and keep Snowlas related questions to a minimum, God knows how many times I've been asked them :P)

replies.body: If you were to get a slap in the face for every Snowlas topic/question you see, would you have already been dead?
replies.body_tagged: If you were to get a slap in the face for every Snowlas topic/question you see, would you have already been dead?

replies.body: I know I would..
replies.body_tagged: I know I would..

reply_to.body: If you were to get a slap in the face for every Snowlas topic/question you see, would you have already been dead?
reply_to.body_tagged: If you were to get a slap in the face for every Snowlas topic/question you see, would you have already been dead?

replies.body:
@WaffleStacks: Do I sense an insult there? :P
Anywho, theoretically speaking I don't think I would. Although, due to my lack of experience with the lifestyle of a homeless individual, I doubt that that'd be my official answer. (Pfft, knowing my patience level, it's probably the opposite xD)
@DaFrozenBlaze: My face would be penetrated so much nobody would be able to identify my corpse.
